text: Erginus sybariticus is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Acmaeidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Nakano & Ozawa (2007). Worldwide phylogeography of limpets of the order Patellogastropoda: Molecular, morphological and palaeontological evidence. Journal of Molluscan Studies 73(1) 79-99 ==External links== * Category:Acmaeidae Category:Gastropods described in 1871
title: Erginus sybariticus
